title: Mixed Reality-Based Situated Learning Environment Design: Advanced Language Proficiency Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language expression skills and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening language proficiency in virtual environments simulating real-life scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic communication scenarios (shopping, travel, social interactions) in the target language with over 80% accuracy in mixed reality environments
Learners can verbally present three or more real-life language application examples within 72 hours of virtual situational learning
Learners can utilize appropriate linguistic expressions with 90% frequency in interactions with peer learners through collaborative simulation activities

resources: Custom Mixed Reality (MR) Learning Scenario Template

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
